lines.text: My name is Bernie Noël. I'm twenty-nine years old, thirty-two soon.
I own a cat, Momo. Momo is a cat for many years, but he is also a feline.
My name is Bernie Noël and I like hyenas, because hyena it is... it is an animal about which we never speak,while it is an animal who can be,... who can be very important.
